CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.entity_location AS SELECT bl.id, res.name AS resource, b.name AS entity, rel.name AS relationship, l.name AS location, bl.notes, r.name AS research, up.name AS updated_by, bl.update_date FROM ruleform.entity_location bl JOIN ruleform.resource res ON bl.resource = res.id JOIN ruleform.entity b ON bl.entity = b.id JOIN ruleform.relationship rel ON bl.relationship = rel.id JOIN ruleform.location l ON bl.location = l.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.research r ON bl.research = r.id JOIN ruleform.resource up ON bl.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.entity_location OWNER TO core;
